docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 22 --Opinion is nearly unanimous in editorial and political circles today that the two resolutions that the Senate passed early this morning after an eight-hour session will not interfere with the government's plans for...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 22 --Opinion is nearly unanimous in editorial and political circles today that the two resolutions that the Senate passed early this morning after an eight-hour session will not interfere with the government's plans for establishing naval and air bases designed for use in continental defense in case the need arises.
docs.abstract: says plans will proceed despite Sen reaction
